official_title: Normal Range Study for Free Light Chains in Blood Among Identical or Fraternal Twins
inclusion_criteria:
* Healthy subjects 18-80 years.
* Must be an identical or fraternal twin (both must be recruited)
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 80 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Symptoms suggestive of multiple myeloma (e.g., renal insufficiency, anemia, bone pain) -
